trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint with a fixed <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref> binding that automatically adds the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref> behavior.
trans-unit.target: Standardowy punkt końcowy ze stałym <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"> </xref> powiązania, które automatycznie dodaje <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"> </xref> zachowanie.

trans-unit.source: Use this endpoint when you are writing a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service that is called from an ASP.NET AJAX application.
trans-unit.target: Użyj tego punktu końcowego podczas pisania [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] usługi, która jest wywoływana z aplikacji ASP.NET AJAX.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"> </xref> z określonym <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> — klasa

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"> </xref> z określonego <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> — klasa
